variant.p: For contributions from employees or third parties that are attributed to periods of service in accordance with paragraph 93(a), changes in the contributions result in:

li.p: current and past service cost (if those changes are not set out in the formal terms of a plan and do not arise from a constructive obligation); or
actuarial gains and losses (if those changes are set out in the formal terms of a plan, or arise from a constructive obligation).
